aboutShort.title: DykesWhoTech
aboutShort.subtitle: Home for lesbians queer women & trans people in the tech industry
aboutShort.description: We are here to create a professional network, advance careers, and build a safe space where technology meets pride.

events.title: Events & Spaces
events.description: Our events are where it all happens. We meet to learn, create, consult, and sometimes just to have a drink and feel at home.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.description: Our events are where it all happens. We meet to learn, create, consult, and sometimes just to have a drink and feel at home.

support.title: Become a sponsor
support.subtitle: Join our proud partners
support.description: Our community grows thanks to the passion and time of volunteers. However, to keep producing high-quality events, investing in great content, and creating meaningful connections, we need your support. Every donation helps us ensure our community remains independent, strong, and accessible to everyone.
